Title: Little Miss Scary.

Authors: Adam Hargreaves;Roger Hargreaves.
Categories: Children's stories.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=8mFYAAAACAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: Little Miss Bad is not good. She is always doing naughty things and worst of all, she lies When she is asked directions to the town by Miss Quick - Miss Bad sends her the opposite way. And one day she lies to Mr Greedy that the baker has no more cakes Everyone is getting very fed up with Miss Bad's lies. How will they get her to start telling the truth?.
Published Year: 2003.
